document_data.name: ''Senses of the Cat''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Senses of the Cat''''', also known as '''''boots of avoidance''''' were enchanted [[boots]] that increased the wearer's defense against ranged weapons.
document_data.Powers: The enchantments of ''Senses of the Cat'' allowed the wearer to sense incoming missiles and helped them to avoid harm from them.
document_data.History: ''Boots of avoidance'' were originally created for an instructor of some archery academy after they were tired of falling victim of countless "accidents" at he hands of the students.
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Elan Garaq]]: a [[rakshasa]] trader and [[Baeloth Barrityl]]'s right-hand from the [[Black Pits]] of [[Underdark]].
*[[Meklin]]: a [[halfling]] associate of [[Neera]] from [[Baldur's Gate]].
*[[Nimbul]]: a bounty hunter that sought to assassinate [[Abdel Adrian]] for [[Sarevok Anchev]] ''circa'' [[1368 DR]].
*[[Reti]]: one of the assailants and kidnappers of [[Tirdir]] from [[Athkatla]], [[Amn]] ''circa'' 1368 DR.
